name: Ramirez Rumble
description: Ramirez Rumble is a simple but fun retro style & unique app-tape/mix-game. Simply smash the jukebox to earn a point & keep the hits playing! Avoid 'GAME OVER" by tapping on the opposite side of the screen to avoid, falling lights & girders. Ramirez Rumble contains a very unique soundtrack featuring never before heard blends & remixes. Unlock additional music, outfits & characters with your highest score. Compete worldwide with the game center leaderboard & get all the game center achievements. Thanks for supporting independent artists & gaming, & helping us create more!
